text: Aaj kal log itne busy hai ki tension bhi appointment lekar aati hai!
Bhai, life ek joke hai—bas punchline samajh nahi aata!
Padhai aur gym ek jaise hote hain—sochte sab hain, jaata koi nahi!
Ghar pe jo remote control dhundh le, usko NASA me job milni chahiye!
Koi insaan kitna bhi successful ho jaye, par ATM se paise nikalte waqt dar lagta hi hai!
Zindagi me kabhi kabhi aisa lagta hai jaise hum WhatsApp ka 'typing...' ho—na message aata hai, na bhejna hota hai!
Bachpan me sochte the bade hoke azaadi milegi, bade hoke samajh aaya—azaadi sirf battery percentage aur WiFi me hoti hai!
Ek samay tha jab ghadi bandh hoti thi toh log time puchte the, aaj kal phone bandh ho toh log zinda hai ki nahi, yeh puchte hain!
Online class aur horror movie me farq sirf itna hai—horror movie me sabko dikhai deta hai, online class me teacher ko sirf apni screen!
Jab bhi mummy ‘baith ke baat kar’ bolti hain, samajh jao bawaal hone wala hai!
Jab bhi koi kehta hai 'Ek baat puchu?', 99% chance hai ki aage bekaar sawal hi hoga!
Agar insaan WhatsApp ka 'delete for everyone' option real life me use kar sakta, toh kitni zindagiyan sudhar jaati!
Aaj kal log itne busy hain ki sukh dukh baatne ke liye bhi Google Drive ka link bhejte hain!
Zindagi ek calculator jaisi ho gayi hai—jitna bhi calculate karo, akhir me 'Syntax Error' aata hi hai!
Exam hall me agar dosti dekhni ho, toh kisi ka pen girne do—pura class dekh lega!
Aaj kal log online itne haste hain, ki lagta hai duniya me sirf emojis hi khush hain!
Hum bachpan me sochte the bada hoke mazze aayenge, bada hoke samajh aaya mazze toh tab the jab hum sochte the ki bada hoke mazze aayenge!
Insaan sab kuch bhool sakta hai, lekin chhoti umar me maara gaya ek thappad hamesha yaad rehta hai!
Aaj kal insaan ghadi pe time kam, steps zyada check karta hai!
India me AC wale kamre me baith ke, garibi pe charcha karne ka alag hi swag hai!
